lead_paragraph: SIEGEL--Jerome. Al Feinman and Barbara Munves mourn the passing of their dear friend Jerry Siegel. Jerry was a man of extraordinary energy, enthusiasm and generosity. He was an inspiration to all who knew him. We grieve his passing and celebrate his life. Al Feinman and Barbara Munves 1/3
